content:
Still in the testing phase, this version built off of 0.2.5 and fixed the Luigi model while adding new areas.

New Areas:
Course 2 Area 1: Cryptic Hideout
Course 2 Area 5: Empty Flooded Hallway
Course 2 Area 6: Cryptic Hideout (copy)
Course 3 Area 2: Big Bob-omb's Fortress
Course 5 Area 4: King Whomp's Battle Arena
Course 6 Area 1: Hazy Maze Cave (empty)
Course 9 Area 3: Maze
Course 11 Area 2: Chief Chilly Challenge
Course 11 Area 5: Chief Chilly's Ring
Metal Cap Area 2: Goomboss Battle
Metal Cap Area 3: Sinister Clockwork
Metal Cap Area 4: [whomp's fortress?]
